title: Germany's Merck KGaA scraps unit brands
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
FRANKFURT, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Germany's Merck KGaA said it would scrap its divisional brands Merck Serono and Merck Millipore and do busines...
